attributes.action: Create proper regulations on the production,sale and use of fireworks
attributes.additional_details: While I would love an all out ban on the sale of fireworks to the general public it's never going to happen. Fighting a losing battle going for that. Some of the things that should be looked at are - the type of fireworks - volume of certain ones on sale to the public for example. Proper restrictions on when they can be purchased and used.
attributes.background: I am creating this petition on behalf of terrified pets and their humans. Years of moaning isn't good enough. Every year they get louder. And while I agree with celebrating the attempt to blow up the Houses of Parliament I am sick of the suffering of our poor pets (and other animals)

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition detailing exactly how you would like the regulations for the production, sale and use of fireworks to be changed.
